item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

10. Scaling Rails and Postgres to millions of users at Microsoft (127 points | 27 comments)

22. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)

26. What Is Post-Quantum Cryptography? – NIST (37 points | 32 comments)
27. Diffusion models are real-time game engines (1053 points | 382 comments)
28. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (1366 points | 455 comments)
29. What's New in SQLAlchemy 2.1? (59 points | 19 comments)
30. Docker-OSX image removed after Apple reports copyright infringement (60 points | 15 comments)
